title: What types of cleaning services do you provide?
desc: We offer daily porter services, janitorial cleaning, restroom sanitation, lobby maintenance, trash removal, floor care, window washing, and more — all tailored to your property's specific needs.

title: Do you offer day porter staffing for buildings?
desc: Yes, we provide uniformed day porters to maintain cleanliness and address issues in real-time. Tasks include trash pickup, restroom restocking, entryway cleaning, and general upkeep throughout the day.

title: Can you customize services based on our building’s needs?
desc: Absolutely. We create customized cleaning plans based on your schedule, property size, traffic volume, and specific maintenance priorities.

title: How do you price your services?
desc: Our pricing is based on service frequency, building size, and scope of work. We offer free on-site assessments and transparent quotes with no hidden fees.

title: Are your cleaners trained and insured?
desc: Yes, all team members are fully trained, background-checked, and insured. We follow strict quality control and safety protocols on every job site.
